para: Data management tools are concerned with the location, transfer, and management of distributed data, as described in Data Management: Key Concepts.
GT4's primary data management tools are:

itemizedlist.listitem: GridFTP for high-performance and reliable data transport
Reliable File Transfer (RFT) service for managing multiple transfers
Replica Location Service (RLS) for maintaining location information for replicated files

para: In addition, GT4 provides tech preview versions of OGSA Data Access and Integration (OGSA-DAI) for accessing and integrated structured and semistructured data, and a Data Replication Service (DRS).
